channel.title: How do i add a pk score board?
channel.description: Hey the title pretty much says it. I'm not sure how to add a pking highscore board (In-game). The object id is 3192. I want it to say the player name and the number of pk points they are in order of who has the most in server.

item.title: How do i add a pk score board?
item.dc:creator: @bily123 bily123
item.description:
@bily123 wrote:

[quote=“Mr. Bobby, post:2, topic:361496”]I’ll get you started.

public int pkPoints = 0;

} else if (token.equals("character-pkPoints")) { pkPoints = Integer.parseInt(token2);

characterfile.write("character-pkPoints = ", 0, 21); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(pkPoints), 0, Integer.toString(pkPoints).length()); characterfile.newLine();

if(objectID == 3192){ sendQuest("@dre@Top Pkers", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest(" ", 8148);

I’m tired and getting ready to go to sleep so try this out and work on it.[/quote]
Yeah i have that already the part i need is how it puts the top 10 with their pk count.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add a pk score board?

item.title: How do i add a pk score board?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

I’ll get you started.

public int pkPoints = 0;

} else if (token.equals("character-pkPoints")) { pkPoints = Integer.parseInt(token2);

characterfile.write("character-pkPoints = ", 0, 21); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(pkPoints), 0, Integer.toString(pkPoints).length()); characterfile.newLine();

if(objectID == 3192){ sendQuest("@dre@Top Pkers", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest(" ", 8148);

I’m tired and getting ready to go to sleep so try this out and work on it.
